Name: xho-imaamismaaeelng
Author: Imaam Ismaaeel Ngqoyiyana
Source: The Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africe(IDM) , https://www.alqurantranslation.com/

Translations.Text: Okanye ucinga okokuba uninzi lwabo luyeva okanye luyaqiqa? Bona banjengeenkomo yeha, bona balahleke nangakumbi (kuneenkomo) eNdleleni
Ingaba ubonile na ukuba iNkosi yakho Isolule njani na isithunzi. Ukuba Ibithanda, Ibingasuka isenze sime ngxishi Kodwa Senze ilanga laba ngumkhokeli waso
Kananjalo nguYe Onenzela ubusuku bube sisigqumathelo, nokulala ibe kukuphumla Aze Enze imini ibe kukuvuka (kwenu)
NguYe Othumela imimoya ibe zizanduleli zeendaba ezilungileyo, ihamba phambi kwenceba yaKhe (imvula); yaye Sithoba amanzi ahlambulukileyo esuka esibhakabhakeni
Khon’ukuze ngawo Sinike ubomi emhlabeni ofileyo, Size Sinike iinkomo nabantu abaninzi eSabadalayo basele kuwo
Kananjalo inene Thina Siwachakachakile (amanzi emvula) phakathi kwabo khon’ukuze bakhumbuzeke, kodwa abaninzi kubo akukho nto bayamkelayo ngaphandle kokungakholwa
Kanti ke ukuba SaSithandile ngeSathumela uMlumkisi5 kwidolophu nganye
Ngoko ke ungabathobeli abangakholwayo, zabalaza kananjalo ngokuchasene nabo ngayo (i’Kur’ân), ibe ngumzabalazo omkhulu

Kananjalo nguYe Okhulule ngaxeshalinye iilwandle ezimbini (iintlobo zamanzi ezimbini) olunye (lunamanzi) amnandi olunye (lunamanzi) anetyuwa nakrakra, Waza phakathi kwawo Wafaka umsantsa ongagqithekiyo
Kananjalo NguYe Owadala umntu ngamanzi, Waza Wamnyulela izizalwana ngokomlibo nomtshato. Yaye iNkosi yakho Inamandla okwenza oko Ithande ukukwenza
Kodwa bakhonza ezinye izinto enzingengoAllâh ezingekhe zibazuzise nto okanye zibenze bungozi, yaye umhedeni wasoloko echasene neNkosi yakhe encedisana noShayâtin
